price: نوح گفت: «پروردگارا، هیچ‌یک از کافران را بر روی زمین باقی مگذار.
arabic: وَقَالَ نُوحٞ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرۡ عَلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ دَيَّارًا

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqāla nūḥun rabbi lā tadhar ʿalā al-arḍi mina al-kāfirīna dayyāran
